Articles.Content:
So I was messing with KSP and decided to build a Biplane. The modmaker for KAX uses the old swept wings alot, so I thought I'd try it with those, too. I think it turned out really well, the struts looks awesome ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) It has the gas guzzling radial prop motor, and the thing is so dang powerful on that light airframe, it works just as well as a helicopter. XD Liberal use of part clipping for unoccupied nodes and offset and rotation is a must, it works so well on detailed crafts. I also got it under the bridge, something I've never done before ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

First time trying to embed an album...

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="//imgur.com/a/qw7Zu/embed"></iframe>

- - - Updated - - -

...Nope

Lemme try that again XD

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/qw7Zu)

- - - Updated - - -

Yay! There you go, guys!

Thanks for reading!

-Slab

Oh, It looks very neat, especially with KAX!

Great work!
Thanks! I can't figure out why, but it's so much fun to fly!!
I like it! I had a lot of fun in my biplane with teeny tiny cockpit. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
aww that is perfect i always wanted to fly a biplane in kerbal ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

haha, Ki 10! You play War Thunder? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Also, if anyone is interested I can try to figure out how to put it up for download.

Thanks for watching!

-Slab

It really is an excellent design, I like it. Nice and simple.

As for uploading the craft file, just upload it to something like Dropbox or Mediafire. Preferably Dropbox.

Haha, I'll try mediafire. Some people use KerbalStuff too, right? I'll have to see how that works too.

EDIT: Ahh, mods only ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) I'll do mediafire ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

Oh, you have to make an account... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) I won't be able to do that then, sorry guys. It wasn't too hard though, I just offset a few Oscar B tanks for the chair to sit on, cover up the sides with control surfaces, then build the tail and wings from there. 

Sorry again!

-Slab
Thanks for the rep! Yeah, it is pretty safe. I've only had one crash where Hudbert didn't survive, a nose down top speed crash into the ground. XD
